name: 運動防護實習（一）
restrict: ◎必須先修過【PEU0067  運動傷害與防護】、【PEU0292  運動貼紮與臨床實作】、【PEU0294  運動推拿指壓學】、【PEU0295  基礎儀器治療學】、【PEU0296  運動傷害評估學】、【PEU0297  運動治療學】
description: 強化與運動傷害防護相關之能力，如：傷害處理、急救、貼/包紮、各部位評估技巧、伸展。
goals: 使學生已學習之運動傷害防護相關能力更加熟練及精熟
syllabus:
*   Week 1: Course Introduction, Syllabus and Expectations; Preparation for Clinical Rotation
*   Week 2: Preparation for Taiwan Athletic Trainer Licensure Exam; Test Construction, Study Calendar Development
*   Week 3: Preparation for Job Seeking & Career Path Establishment– SWOT Analysis
*   Week 4: **Mock Licensure Written Exam #1 (Foundation Subjects)**
*   Week 5: \*(1) On-the-field Evaluation and Management; FIFA Medical network: Touchline Care Module
*   Week 6: \*(2) Sudden Cardiac Arrest and General Emergency in Sports; FIFA Medical network: General Emergency Module; **Clinical Education Journal#1 & Clinical Evaluation#1**
*   Week 7: \*(3) Environment related Sport Illness & Sports Team Travel; FIFA Medical network: Environment; Team Travel Modules  
*   Week 8: \*(4) Special Considerations for Female & Youth athletes; FIFA Medical network: Female Athlete; The Younger Player Modules
*   Week 9: \*(5) Sport-related Concussion; FIFA Medical network: Concussion Module
*   Week 10: **Mock Licensure Written Exam #2 (Professional Subjects)**
*   Week 11: \*(6) Psychological Responses to Rehabilitation; FIFA Medical network: Mental Health Module; **Clinical Education Journal#2 & Clinical Evaluation#2**
*   Week 12: \*(7) Infection Control and Management in Sport; FIFA Medical network: Infectious Diseases Module
*   Week 13: \*(8) Introduction to Adaptive Sports for Athletic Trainer; FIFA Medical Network: Disability Football Module
*   Week 14: **Mock Licensure Practical Exam #1**
*   Week 15: **Mock Licensure Practical Exam #2**
*   Week 16: Clinical Education Closing Remarks and Reflections**; Clinical Education Journal#3 & Clinical Evaluation#3**

**\* 1-8 Student-led Education and Discussion Sessions**

methodologies.note: Eight student-led education and discussion sessions on a variety of sports medicine topics
Eight student-led education and discussion sessions on a variety of sports medicine topics
FIFA Medical Network, International Guideline and Procedures

grading.note: FIFA Medical Network: Student-led Education and Discussion Session

Clinical Evaluations
(Students must receive at least satisfactory evaluations (grade of B- or better) during their clinical education experience. The evaluations completed are to be averaged for a final grade. A- Average or above = 100 pts. B- to B+ Average = 80 pts. C+ Average or below = 0 pts.)

prerequisite: ◎必須先修過【PEU0067  運動傷害與防護】、【PEU0292  運動貼紮與臨床實作】、【PEU0294  運動推拿指壓學】、【PEU0295  基礎儀器治療學】、【PEU0296  運動傷害評估學】、【PEU0297  運動治療學】
